name.cantanima.chineseremainderclock

Class CRC_Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • name.cantanima.chineseremainderclock.CRC_Animation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class CRC_Animation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Controls animation of the clock. The main points to understand are that every animation will be started roughly half a second before the clock hits a new second -- that is, right around 500 milliseconds time -- and that the subsequent number of frames over the followed half seconds need to complete within the next half second. Time between frames will be determined by the Clock_Drawer's preferred_step() method, and when it is time to draw a new frame the animator will call the Clock_Drawer's draw() method (indirectly, through CRC_View's onDraw).
    See Also:
    Clock_Drawer.draw(Canvas), CRC_View.onDraw(Canvas)
